title:
The following form is loaded in a recent browser and submitted, with the second select option selected:

<form method="post">
    <select name="list">
        <option>one</option>
        <option>two</option>
        <option>three</option>
    </select>
</form>

In the server-side PHP code to deal with the form data, what is the value of $_POST['list'] ?
